R0082.title: Employee Sabotage
R0082.definition: The potential threat of internal employees deliberately taking malicious actions to damage the company's information systems, resources, or business activities.
R0082.description: Scenarios may include employees deliberately deleting important data, tampering with system configurations, launching denial-of-service attacks, or intentionally spreading malware.
R0082.influence: Harms include data loss, system disruption, service unavailability, and negative impacts on the company's reputation.

references.title: Employee Working from Home Destroys Company Data! Weimob Group Market Cap Evaporates 900 Million in One Day
